sys_hub_flow.description: In this part of the challenge, you apply what you have learned in this module to create a scheduled flow to check for overdue NeedIt Tasks, close the overdue tasks, update the work notes for the task with a reason, and log the automatic closure.
sys_hub_flow.name: Challenge NeedIt application

sys_element_mapping.value: Needlt Task {{f61ebdc2-d988-4f94-8837-a5407e3dd941.item.number}}was automatically closed because its due date of {{f61ebdc2-d988-4f94-8837-a5407e3dd941.item.due_date}} was older than the autoCloseOverdue setting of{{f0034b10-ed56-42b7-9fb4-3f6e16dfbcaa.property_value}}days
